bibl.title: The Relationship of P. Oxy. XVII 2153 to P. Oxy. L 3595-3597.
bibl.note: A clearer resolution of the abbreviations in P. Oxy. XVII, 2153 comes from P. Oxy. L, 3595-3597. These three documents called for the production of wine jars designated as "Oxyrhynchite" d€xoa, tetrãxoa, and diplok°rama. <dichoa, tetrachoa, diplokerama>
MAYERSON Philip, The Relationship of P. Oxy. XVII 2153 to P. Oxy. L 3595-3597.
